Articles.Content:
what am i doing wrong chaps i cant upload the first of my craft ive desigined, the first of many i hope from Griff Space Labs based on the currunt SLS designs.

Have tryed 9 times to upload my crew craft with no joy ive shorted the name got the correct pic size everything i can think of and still cant upload .

Please please please is there a idiots guide to tell me how to upload to spaceport etc am at at loss and rapidilly losing intrest:huh:
A description of the problem would be a good place to start, what happens when you try and upload?
so i do everything required and then it says ive uploaded but then after i wait a while like 6hrs my upload isnt there yet other uploads made my other people are there that were made on the same day.
I believe your first upload has to be manually approved to prevent spam, give it a day or two.
ok so you saying it fine for my first upload to take 6 days before showing up?

ok so you saying it fine for my first upload to take 6 days before showing up?

Um, you said 6 hours, not 6 days, so no, I would assume that EndlessWaves doesn't think that 6 days is normal. How would anyone know how long you've been waiting in total?

It's odd that it would take that long. I've had to wait a day or so in the past for things to update, but never 6 days. Perhaps one of the forum moderators can give you concrete advice.

ive tryed and tryed its first time ive made anything for a game let alone share it and at the moment iam not enjoying the experance yes i said 6hrs which is the time i waited to see if anything happens but since my first upload its been 6 days , in which time ive tryed god knows how many times to upload . so there is deff omthing wrong as other people are uploading on a daily basis.

There's still some wonkiness going on with the forums in general after the nuking - I still can't post any attachments (pictures or craft files) my own self. I'm hoping it's something the moderators can resolve soon.

Not helpful; I'm just saying I feel your pain.
oh i never thought of that, any top brass around to comfirm or deny this?

Don't upload to the forums, it's notoriously broken.

Upload to something like mediafire or dropbox and post a link in the forums.

oh i see ok thanks.

Now onto my next problem lol
